faqs.q: How many calories are in a pound of ground beef?
faqs.a: About 1117 kcal for 1 pound (454 g) of cooked 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a pound of ground beef?
faqs.a: Approximately 109 g of protein in cooked 80% lean ground beef.

faqs.q: Does leaner ground beef have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Yes, 90% lean drops it to ~799 kcal per pound versus 1117 for 80% lean.

faqs.q: Are these calories for cooked or raw ground beef?
faqs.a: Cooked and drained; raw 80% lean is lower at ~816 kcal per pound due to moisture loss during cooking.

faqs.q: How does fat content affect calories in ground beef?
faqs.a: Higher fat (e.g., 70% lean) increases calories; 80% lean has 16 g fat per 100 g, adding ~73 g total fat per pound.
